boxer_robot.setting: Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact. The robot has two grippers and thus the robot can hold two objects at most simultaneously.

preservation_box.setting: This preservation box can be opened or closed.

refrigerator.setting: This refrigerator is a manual door opening refrigerator. Only when the refrigerator is open can objects be taken out of the box or placed in the refrigerator.

state_description.type: the type of the robot or object, e.g., robot, cube, table, etc.
state_description.position: the 3d position of the robot or object, e.g., [4.0, 6.0, -2.0]
state_description.size: the size of the robot or object, e.g., size of an apple is 0.1
state_description.gripper_content: the content in the gripper of the robot. It is a nested list that represent the affliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.setting: the role setting of the robot or object, e.g., 'Robot can only touch objects within the range of gripper contact.'
state_description.gripper_contact_range: the range of robot gripper contact, e.g., 0.5
state_description.open_close_state: the state of the door, e.g., 'Open' or 'Closed'
state_description.content: the content in the corresponding object. It is a nested list that represent the affliation relationship of objects. e.g., [], [['bowl']], [['fruit_tray',['apple']]]
state_description.plate_1_on_breakfast_table: whether the plate_1 on the _on_breakfast_table or not, e.g., True or False
state_description.plate_2_on_breakfast_table: whether the plate_2 on the _on_breakfast_table or not, e.g., True or False
state_description.preservation_box_on_breakfast_table: whether the preservation box is on the breakfast table or not, e.g., True or False
